translated: Seeking purification in the wrong way,
I served the fire in the forest.
Not knowing the path to purification,
I practiced the austerity of immortality.
That happiness I attained through happiness,
see the excellence of the Dhamma!
The three knowledges have been attained,
the Buddha’s instruction has been done.
Formerly I was a friend of Brahmā,
now I am a true brahmin.
I am one with the three knowledges,
a bath-attendant, a scholar, a knower of the Vedas.”
